skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of filling the Turn Meters of all allies by 30%. 

Also has a 75% chance of removing all debuffs from all allies.

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Also places a 25% [Strengthen] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Conduit of Agonies

skills.desc:
Increases this Championâ€™s RES by 20 and DEF by 10% for each [Ally Protection] buff on allies. Also increases ally RES by 15 and DEF by 5% for each [Ally Protection] buff on allies. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this skill, only one will activate. 

Counterattacks whenever an ally under an [Ally Protection] buff is attacked. Can occur once per enemy turn.
